channel.title: Protests on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Protests on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Toronto: ‘The Road Between Us’ Premieres, Highlighting the Divisions Among Filmgoers
item.description: Barry Avrich’s reinstated movie about Israel and Oct. 7 made its debut to cheers, protests and charged emotions.

item.title: Toronto: ‘The Road Between Us’ Premieres, Highlighting the Divisions Among Filmgoers
item.description: Barry Avrich’s reinstated movie about Israel and Oct. 7 made its debut to cheers, protests and charged emotions.

item.title: US Congressman’s Brother Lands No-Bid Contract to Train DHS Snipers
item.description: DHS says retired Marine sniper Dan LaLota’s firm is uniquely qualified to meet the government’s needs. LaLota tells WIRED his brother, GOP congressman Nick LaLota, played no role in the contract.

item.title: US Congressman’s Brother Lands No-Bid Contract to Train DHS Snipers
item.description: DHS says retired Marine sniper Dan LaLota’s firm is uniquely qualified to meet the government’s needs. LaLota tells WIRED his brother, GOP congressman Nick LaLota, played no role in the contract.

item.title: DHS Tells Police That Common Protest Activities Are ‘Violent Tactics’
item.description: DHS is urging law enforcement to treat even skateboarding and livestreaming as signs of violent intent during a protest, turning everyday behavior into a pretext for police action.
